name: KUBIKOS
description:
Build your own village. Decorate your house with your mates ' furniture and your own eyes. Learn more and more, and you will never be able to build massive castles and temples! Start building and show the world your best game and constructions. Crafting and Building is best game for the whole family: from kids, boys and girls, to adults.

Many block types:

There are many square sorts extending grass, square, water lava magma roads, crystals and much more. You have numerous choices with regards to building your realm.

Features:

*- 3 type of locomotion Flying, Teleport and Smooth

*- Autosave. Your progress never be erased.

*- Big Landscape. You can build more than  one world

*- Enable or disable player Gravity

* - Perfect game for the whole family: boys and girls will love it.

* - Build anything: house with a room and a kitchen? A castle?

* - One of the best simulation games: begin constructing your dream world

* - Fun game: Play with villagers and animals it is so fun!

* - Cool graphics: enjoy the best  graphics with animated cube.

* - Free game: play the game for free!

* - Building game: Build your own construction

COMMING SOON:

*World generation.

*Crafting.

*Enemy's.

*New 3D models building, props and environment.

*New interact

*And much more.
